Banner.Description: I have 1.5+ years of experience s a website and mobile app developer, I specialize in Angular, Flutter, React, React Native , and more I create clean, scalable code and develop systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to improve the web. My dedication to best practices ensures reusable code in Angular, Flutter, React, React Native, and Python Passionate about enhancing user experiences, I push boundaries and deliver exceptional results in the digital realm.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 1.5 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I am performing continuous integration, and covering frontend developer roles with Angular,Flutter,React and React-Native. I have team having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Developer
Description: Remote Frontend Developer at ASM Tech Office
Developed and maintained a web-based application for a Tax Office using Angular, resulting in improved user experience and increased performance.
Integrated RESTful APIs of NestJS to support multiple applications, using Angular for frontend development.
Built a real-time chat application using WebSockets and Angular, increasing communication and collaboration among team members.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Taking charge of a single resource, successfully leading the development of two frontend projects for the Tax Office platform, utilizing Angular and Angular Material.
Planning meetings and generating reports.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Engineer
Description: Remote Frontend Engineer at Trillo Inc
Angular Developer
Using HTLM,CSS and BOOTSTRAP to create a user-friently and responsive web pages
Use of UI design tools such as Figma.
Building reusable code for future use.
Get feedback from, and build solutions for users and customers
Optimizing web pages for maximum speed and scalability.
Flutter Developer
Android and IOS mobile application development.
Optimization of UI for multiple-sized mobile devices.
3D Model Integration.
Integration of APIs and Micro-Services.
Design ergonomic and user-friendly UI.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Backend-Internee
Description: Design, develop and maintain high-quality and generally reliable Python codes.
Maintain and update the design specifications and source code for the ERP system.
Collaborate with the technical team to improve application performance features.
Hardware Integration.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: One Diamond Marketing
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: One Diamond Marketing presents a revolutionary project boasting seamless integration of Syncfusion Calendar, dynamic charts, JSON to PDF conversion, optimized performance, and robust authentication.Angular Reactive Forms are also implemented. Experience the future of marketing.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: One Diamond (Mobile Application)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: One Diamond Marketing Mobile Application is application for the clients to view there details on mobile app.Which presents a revolutionary project boasting seamless integration of Syncfusion Calendar, dynamic charts, JSON to PDF conversion, optimized performance, and robust authentication.Angular Reactive Forms are also implemented. Experience the future of marketing.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Pak Foods! (e-commerce website)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: PakFood, my personal project, is an exciting e-commerce website for food lovers. Explore a curated selection of delicious dishes, including Pakistani cuisine. Enjoy convenient online shopping and order from the comfort of your home. Discover the joy of PakFood today. It has  Checkout page, Proceed Order, auth, and stripe integration for secure payments.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Multi-Tasker(Mobile App)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This platform will offer a solution for the tradesmen with their next task without any difficulty or waiting for their next project, as the tradesmen also want the shortest possible delay in between their services. The tradesmen's dilemma of not having to work for a company where they are given a salary but are still required to work is likewise resolved by doing this. It has report, ,  order history, Post Task, auth, and stripe integration for secure payments.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Multi-Tasker- Admin-Panel
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This is the admin panel for the multi-tasker application. These features empower administrators to efficiently manage users, tasks, payments, support, and platform security.This is updated with , reporting and analytics, payment management, security and permissions, dashboard, review and rating management, task filtering.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
